headline: Elise Stefanik is the human embodiment of how the GOP went down the tubes
sentences: According to a New York Times profile, Stefanik sacrificed a circle of her Harvard friends, got ousted from the advisory committee of her alma mater's prestigious Institute of Politics, and turned prickly whenever someone suggested her abrupt shapeshifting might come back to haunt her at a later date.
